venue.name: A.M.C. Highland Center at Crawford Notch

item.description:
I know this is short notice but decided to post this hike just in case anyone wanted to join me.

We begin our day at the Crawford path trailhead located across the street from the AMC Highland Center. We ascend Mt. Pierce via the Crawford path and Webster cliff trails. From the summit of Pierce, we follow the Webster Cliff trail to the summit of Mt. Jackson. From the summit of Jackson, we follow the Webster-Jackson trail back to rt302 to the Jackson-Webster trailhead. From this trailhead, there is a short road walk back to the highland center.

Distance 8.09 mi
Time 6 hr 48 min
Elev Gain +3182 ft




***** IMPORTANT NOTES *****

-- This event is categorized as Intermediate to advanced.

-- Be prepared for full Winter conditions - snowshoes, microspikes, goggles, extra gloves/clothes may all be needed.

-- Bring head lamps, I fully expect to be out before dark, but better safe than sorry

-- If you have any questions on equipment or the hike please ask before showing up for the hike.

-- Any changes or cancellations will be expressed to hikers that have RSVP'd "YES" for this event.

-- Please arrive early and be prepared to start at the designated time.



Mountain weather is subject to rapid changes and extreme conditions. We will assess travel and weather conditions during our hike and make changes to our planned trip as necessary.

Being prepared, traveling with the appropriate gear & knowing how to use it is your personal responsibility. Test and adjust your gear prior to this trip.

!! NO COTTON CLOTHING !! - Cotton (a.k.a. the death cloth) has no place in the mountains. If you arrive wearing cotton clothing you will be turned away.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup cars at the A.M.C. Highland Center at Crawford Notch. Larry's cell 978-886-6041
item.name: Pierce and Jackson
